<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Aram<s%> and <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to [wage] <S%H4421>war;<s%> and they <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> but <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H3898>overcome<s%> him.

So <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to Tiglath-pileser <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I am your <S%H5650>servant<s%> and your <S%H1121>son;<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> up and <S%H3467>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Aram,<s%> and from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who are <S%H6965>rising<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> me."

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and in the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H7810>present<s%> to the king of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

Now <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> Tiglath-pileser <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] at <S%H1834>Damascus;<s%> and <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H1823>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and its <S%H8403>model,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H4639>workmanship.<s%>

So <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar;<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> [it,] <S%H5704>before<s%> the <S%H935>coming<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> from <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%>
